Mountain Bars (No-bake Cookies)

cookies

Ingredients

  • 2 cups white sugar
  • 1/2 cup milk
  • 1/4 cup butter
  • 3/4 cup crunchy peanut butter
  • 1/2 tsp vanilla
  • 2 1/2 cups oatmeal
  • 6 tbsp cocoa powder

Procedure

  1. In a medium bowl, combine oatmeal and cocoa powder, set aside
  2. In a saucepan, combine butter, milk, and sugar and heat until just boiling
  3. Add vanilla and peanut butter and stir until the peanut butter fully dissolves
  4. Pour mixture overtop the cocoa/oat mixture and stir to combine.
  5. Drop lumps onto a parchment paper lined cookie sheet and allow to cool
